Title: Requires certain notices of procurement contracts to be made available on the internet for at least five days
Summary: Requires notices of procurement contract opportunities required to effectuate the provisions of section sixteen-ff of section one of the New York state urban development corporation act shall be available on the internet for at least five days.
LawCode: Amd ยง142, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to the publishing of certain procurement contract opportunities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
